learnset.name: Tackle
learnset.description: A NORMAL-type attack. Many Pokémon know this attack right from the start.

learnset.name: Growl
learnset.description: A technique that lowers the target's ATTACK power. Can normally be used up to six times.

learnset.name: Leech Seed
learnset.description: Plants a seed on the target Pokémon. The seed slowly drains the target's HP for the attacker.

learnset.name: Vine Whip
learnset.description: A GRASS-type attack. The Pokémon uses its cruel whips to strike the opponent.

learnset.name: Poison Powder
learnset.description: A technique that poisons the target. If poisoned, the victim loses HP steadily.

learnset.name: Razor Leaf
learnset.description: A GRASS-type attack that sends sharp-edged leaves at the target. Likely to get a critical hit.

learnset.name: Growth
learnset.description: Raises SPECIAL to make special attacks stronger and enhance protection against special moves.

learnset.name: Sleep Powder
learnset.description: Induces sleep. A Pokémon will stay asleep for several turns if an item isn't used to wake it.

learnset.name: Solar Beam
learnset.description: The strongest GRASS-type attack. Energy is absorbed in the first turn, then fired the next turn.

tm_moves.name: Swords Dance
tm_moves.description: A special move that greatly boosts the user's ATTACK power. Can normally be used up to three times.

tm_moves.name: Toxic
tm_moves.description: A technique that badly poisons the target. The amount of damage from the poison increases every turn.

tm_moves.name: Body Slam
tm_moves.description: A NORMAL-type attack. Has a one-in-three chance of paralyzing the target if it connects.

tm_moves.name: Take Down
tm_moves.description: A charging attack. One quarter of the damage it inflicts comes back to hurt the attacker.

tm_moves.name: Double-Edge
tm_moves.description: A charging tackle attack. One quarter of the damage it inflicts comes back to hurt the attacker.

tm_moves.name: Rage
tm_moves.description: A non-stop attack move. The user's ATTACK power increases every time it sustains damage.

tm_moves.name: Mega Drain
tm_moves.description: A GRASS-type attack. It adds half the HP it drained from the target to the attacker's HP.

tm_moves.name: Solar Beam
tm_moves.description: The strongest GRASS-type attack. Energy is absorbed in the first turn, then fired the next turn.

tm_moves.name: Mimic
tm_moves.description: A move for learning one of the opponent's moves, for use during that battle only.

tm_moves.name: Double Team
tm_moves.description: Creates illusionary copies of the user. The copies disorient the enemy, reducing its accuracy.

tm_moves.name: Reflect
tm_moves.description: Reduces damage from physical attacks by about half. A special PSYCHIC-type technique.

tm_moves.name: Bide
tm_moves.description: The user waits for several turns. At the end, it returns double the damage it received.

tm_moves.name: Rest
tm_moves.description: The user takes a nap to fully restore its HP and recover from any status abnormalities.

tm_moves.name: Substitute
tm_moves.description: Uses 1/4 of the user's maximum HP to create a substitute that takes the opponent's attacks.

tm_moves.name: Cut
tm_moves.description: A NORMAL-type attack. Also used for cutting small bushes to open new paths.
